when csgo gone free to play the game has been full of cheating idiots everywhere. Why mae csgo for free from the first place????? Ban every fkn cheater in this game and make it cost idiots!!!!!!!!!!!!

Despite having both played for 30+ hours and even PAYING for the game, I am unable to play with friends due to being unranked.
At the same time, in order to get ranked, I must win 10 matches; thing is, this takes A VERY LONG TIME because 1) the matchmaking system is possibly flawed (getting matched with way better people than myself) and 2) YOU GET BANNED FOR 21 HOURS IF YOU WIN 2 GAMES IN 1 DAY - REGARDLESS OF HAVING SPENT 13EUR ON THE GAME!
So no, I would NOT recommend BUYING this game. I STRONGLY disagree with the practice of banning someone for 21 hours because of 2 wins in one day while simultaneously preventing these PAYING CUSTOMERS from playing with friends due to being unranked.
Free version is somewhat recommended as you can expect certain limitations when playing a game you haven't paid for IMO.
Good game,but you can do an better AntiCheat
